page.title: 16A Walk Round Ashbourne.
page.content: Many houses in Ashbourne are old and beautifully decorated with pillars and balconies.Footscrapers show how dirty streets used to be.Some windows had faulty glass or were even bricked up because glass was so expensive. In Ashbourne there are{almshouses}over three hundred years old.They were built so that old people would have somewhere to live. Some streets are cobbled from the days when horses were used.On the corners of these are pillars to protect the walls from cart wheels.Some streets have names that remind you of the past such as Hall Lane and Tunnel Yard.{Gas {lamps}were used to light these streets.
